subject: Re: Hot off the press! WP Perk Pty Ltd has merged with Wolf IQ Pty Ltd
preview: ##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WP Perk Support,  We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -##
Hello WP Perk Support,

We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below:

https://support.combinate.me/requests/26000/satisfaction/new/bv9muXalghJD5eFEzb1AIPe5X?locale=1176

Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about:

WP Perk Support

20 May 2022, 19:15 GMT+10

Hello there,

It's official! WP Perk is merging with its parent company - Wolf IQ. By July 1, 2022 all WP Perk clients will transition over to Wolf IQ.

First up, I would like to reassure you that there will be no impact on your website, pricing or customer service. I promise. The WP Perk and Wolf IQ teams already work closely together on a daily basis, so you are guaranteed a smooth transition.

So why the change? This move is all about streamlining our customer experience and broadening our range of services. Wolf IQ has grown in recent years from a humble graphic design and website development company into a full-service digital agency.

By welcoming our clients from WP Perk into the 'Pack' at Wolf IQ, we can offer you more services to grow your business, including consolidated billing and support. More to come on the new services in the coming weeks!

The only real difference will be the name on your monthly invoice - Wolf IQ Pty Ltd. Sorry - we still have to send those! Please let your accounts team know of the change.

When requesting support, please email support@wolfiq.com.au.

If you have any questions, feel free to respond to this email or to give me a call.

We're excited to (officially) welcome you to our pack!

Speak soon,

Heath Maguire

Thanks,

Heath Maguire

##- Please type your reply above this line -##


Your request (#26000) has been solved. To reopen this request, reply to this email or click the link below:

It’s official! WP Perk is merging with its parent company - Wolf IQ. By July 1, 2022 all WP Perk clients will transition over to Wolf IQ. 

First up, I would like to reassure you that there will be no impact on your website, pricing or customer service. I promise. The WP Perk and Wolf IQ teams already work closely together on a daily basis, so you are guaranteed a smooth transition.

So why the change? This move is all about streamlining our customer experience and broadening our range of services. Wolf IQ has grown in recent years from a humble graphic design and website development company into a full-service digital agency. 

By welcoming our clients from WP Perk into the ‘Pack’ at Wolf IQ, we can offer you more services to grow your business, including consolidated billing and support. More to come on the new services in the coming weeks!
